| have observed on numerous occasions that force personnel,
particularly gazetted officers, come to meet me in miy office in civilian
clothes. This is against established norms of any uniformed force.

| would, henceforth, take adverse view of such a behaviour.
Any force personnel! coming to meet me in my office should come in
working uniform.

ids
(M.S. Bali)
Inspector General/AS
